Package elements

Class Projectile

java.lang.Object
java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
elements.MovingImage
elements.Projectile
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Projectile
extends MovingImage
Used to create the projectile used by the car to sabotage the other car during the game
Version:
5/20/21
Author:
Alex Lan

  • Constructor Details

    • Projectile

      public Projectile​(processing.core.PImage img, int x, int y, int xv, int yv)
      Project constructor with a lifespan int set to 60 (approx. 1 second).
      Parameters:
      img - image file that the car will be using
      x - x-coordinate of the projectile
      y - y-coordinate of the projectile
      xv - x-velocity of the projectile
      yv - y-velocity of the projectile

  • Method Details

    • act

      public void act()
      Changes the location of the Projectile object. Also lowers the lifespan of the projectile.

    • getLifespan

      public int getLifespan()
      Returns the current lifespan left of the projectile.
      Returns:
      integer for the lifespan of the Projectile object
